title: Nonomura Byouin no Hitobito (Mystery of Nonomura Hospital)
synopsis: Takumaro Kaibara: brilliant detective, daring adventurer, AND TOTAL PERVERT! There's no crime he can't solve, and no skirt he won't chase in the name of justice! So when Takumaro lands a case at Nonomura Hospital (famous for its hot nurses), it seems like a match made in Heaven.
characters: ['Nonomura, Akiko', 'Itou, Ryoko', 'Kaibara, Takumaro', 'Fujiki', 'Makino, Rie', 'Mamiya, Chisato', 'Nozawa, Miho']
staff: [['Oomiya, Saburou', ['Producer']], ['Takakuwa, Hajime', ['Sound Supervisor']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugiura, Shouichirou', ['Art Director']]]
